A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This might be the worst Star Wars movie I have ever seen.  Completely underdeveloped characters humor that did not work and just a very weak story\, oh and let's not forget the pointless things just thrown in for Disney to sell stuff..Everyone will need the secret Rebel Decoder ring for Christmas now.  I waited 2 years to find out about Snoke! and what I found out was nothing.
